abstract: All England Club, which organizes the Wimbledon tennis tournament, bans the use of selfie sticks; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: The All England Club, which organizes the Wimbledon tennis tournament, banned the use of selfie sticks, calling them a nuisance.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Tennis; Selfie Sticks Banned at Wimbledon

snippet: The All England Club, which organizes the Wimbledon tennis tournament, banned the use of selfie sticks, calling them a nuisance.
